content.title: Skills
content.body: What I'm good at, and how it can help you.

content.title: Logic
content.body: I am a great problem solver. I excel at finding solutions and implementing them.

content.title: Code
content.body: I'm an excellent coder. My code is clean, and it's always kept up after. I test my code. I make sure my code stands rot.

content.title: Speed
content.body: I write quality code quickly. In fact, this website was written by me from scratch, in one day.

content.title: LocalWeather
content.description: A weather stats viewer. Syncs up to your location non-intrusively, or you can choose to use geolocation.

content.title: WikiViewer
content.description: A Google of sorts for Wikipedia. Feel free to search up anything and everything!

content.title: Calculator
content.description: A simple calculator inspired by the Samsung Galaxy 8's calculator.

content.title: Let's collaborate
content.body: Tell me about your team and your project. I'm here to help.

content.title: Tell me about your situation.
content.body: Please tell me crucial information about yourself and your project. I should reply within one or two days to work something out with you.
content.query: What is your project? Why do you want it done? What do you want to do with it? How can I assist you in the process? Financial and temporal budgets are loved.*
